title: About
text: My name is Alden Kling. I am currently taking DSR002 at Pomona College.

title: March Madness
text:
library(ggplot2)
team_results <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2024/2024-03-26/team-results.csv')

Rows: 236 Columns: 20
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (3): TEAM, F4PERCENT, CHAMPPERCENT
dbl (17): TEAMID, PAKE, PAKERANK, PASE, PASERANK, GAMES, W, L, WINPERCENT, R...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

ggplot(team_results, aes(y = R64, x = PAKE)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = CHAMP), size = 3, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_color_gradient(low="lightblue", high="black") +
  labs(
    y = "tournaments attended",
    x = "performance against komputer expectation",
    title = "Tournaments Attended Vs. Performance Against Komputer Expectation"
)

title: Dickinson’s Poems
Alden Kling
text: My name is Alden Kling, and this is my website.

title: Education in English Towns
text:
library(ggplot2)
english_education <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2024/2024-01-23/english_education.csv')

Rows: 1104 Columns: 31
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (13): town11cd, town11nm, size_flag, rgn11nm, coastal, coastal_detailed,...
dbl (18): population_2011, ks4_2012_2013_counts, key_stage_2_attainment_scho...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

ggplot(english_education, aes(y = population_2011 / 1000, x = education_score)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = university_flag),  alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_y_log10() +
  labs(
    y = "town population (1000s)",
    x = "education score",
    title = "Town Population in English Towns Vs. Education Score"
)

Warning: Removed 4 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
